page_7_img_1.png.description: Beam with pinned support at left end and fixed support at right end, subjected to uniform distributed load q = 12 N/mm acting downward across entire length. Beam properties include length l = 1200 mm, flexural rigidity EI_y = 10^12 N·mm², and elastic foundation stiffness k = 750(1+6/10) N/mm. Central point load V = ? shown at mid-span. Problem asks to determine the vertical displacement v. Coordinate system shows z-axis along beam length.

page_8_img_1.png.description: Analysis of beam with pinned support at left end and fixed support at right end under uniform distributed load q. Top diagram shows original beam configuration with unknown vertical displacement V at mid-span and coordinate axes z_L and z_1. Middle section shows free body diagrams for two beam segments with reaction forces ql at supports and moment expressions M_1 = -ql·x_1 + q·x_1²/2 and M_2 = -ql·x_2 + q·x_2²/2. Bottom diagram illustrates shear force distribution with reactions V_2 at both ends, downward unit load, and shear moment expressions SM_1 = -1/2·x_1 and SM_2 = -1/2·x_2.

page_17_img_1.png.description: Three-dimensional box section rib with rectangular cross-section subjected to vertical forces F at corners. Left view shows isometric perspective with dimensions l_1 (length), l_3 (height), and l_2/2 (half-width on each side). Forces F applied at four corners labeled A, with thickness t indicated. Right view shows cross-sectional elevation with width l_1, height l_3, and x-axis orientation. Problem statement requests modeling the rib as a beam and determining bending moment at x = l_1/2. Given data: l_1 = 500 mm, l_2 = 1500 mm, l_3 = 150 mm, t = 1.0 mm, F = 6000 N, A = 500 mm².

page_19_img_1.png.description: Superposition analysis showing equilibrating shear flows in rectangular rib cross-section. Top diagram shows four corner forces with magnitudes 3F/4·l_3 (vertical) and F/4·l_3 (horizontal), with internal shear flows F/4l_3 along edges. Bottom diagram shows equilibrium configuration with reversed flow directions. Final beam model representation shows rib as beam with upward force F/4 at right end, downward force 3F/4 at left end, and moment M indicated by curved arrows in cross-section. Coordinate system with x-axis shown. Moment equation given as M(x) = F/4·x - Fx/4 = 0.

two_segment_beam_prescribed_displacement.description: Structural diagram of a two-segment beam with fixed support on left, roller support in middle, and prescribed displacement at right end. Shows EI and ℓ properties for each segment with downward displacement ū indicated.

inclined_beam_vertical_load_moment.png.description: Inclined beam member with fixed support at base, pin support at top, vertical load V at top, and applied moment Hₑ. Shows length ℓ, angle θ, and material properties EI and GJ.

beam_distributed_load_spring_support.png.description: Beam with fixed support on left, spring support on right, distributed load q along top surface, and unknown vertical displacement V. Shows two equal segments with properties EI and ℓ, and spring constant k.

l_shaped_rigid_link_vertical_force.png.description: L-shaped rigid link structure with pin support at base (angle θ), vertical force F at corner, and rigid link connection at top. Shows beam segment with properties ℓ, EI, and GJ(x).

rigid_link_solution_diagram.png.description: Solution diagram showing L-shaped rigid link with coordinate system (x,z), pin support at base with angle θ, vertical force F, and beam properties ℓ, EI, GJ(x). Includes essential boundary conditions listed.

circular_bar_distributed_moment.png.description: Circular bar cross-section diagram showing distributed moment Mₜ applied along length, with properties ℓ and GJ, and angle θ indicated. Shows coordinate system with x and z axes.

three_dimensional_rib_structure.png.description: Three-dimensional rib structure showing isometric view and cross-section. Isometric shows rectangular rib with forces F at corners, dimensions ℓ₁, ℓ₂, ℓ₃, and thickness t. Cross-section shows rectangular profile with width ℓ₁ and height ℓ₃.

rectangular_frame_shear_flow_decompositi.description: Beam model decomposition showing rectangular frame with force F, broken into symmetric and antisymmetric loading cases. Shows shear flow distributions and equilibrium conditions for torsion analysis.

frame_superposition_beam_model.png.description: Superposition of effects diagram showing rectangular frame with distributed forces F/4ℓ₃ and F/4 at corners. Shows equilibrating flows and final beam model with moment H and distributed load.
